Author: suzimimi
Text: TRYING TO LOSE OR MAINTAIN WEIGHT ON VALPORIC ACID IS A HELLSCAPE. It doesn't make everyone gain weight, but if you do get that side-effect, it is always pretty bad.  I'm losing weight on depakote right now, so it can be done. I had the weight gain side effect and gained 50 lbs.  Also, I have bipolar disorder and almost all my episodes are "with mixed features" so hit me up if you ever need to chat
